footer.description: Leading Algerian company specialized in flat glass manufacturing and transformation since 2004.
footer.copyright: © 2024 VITROSAK. All rights reserved. | Algerian Glass Manufacturing Excellence

hero.subtitle1: Producer of automotive, architectural, and household appliances glass.
hero.subtitle2: VITROSAK is the first factory in the region to fully manufacture glass and windshields for buses and heavy construction machines, combining foreign expertise with top-quality local production.

products.busesHeavyMachinery: Buses and Heavy Construction Machines Windshields and Window Glass
products.availableFlatCurved: Available in both flat and curved configurations
products.availableDoubleTriple: Available in double and triple glazing systems

productCatalog.intro: From architectural marvels to automotive precision, our diverse product catalog meets every glass manufacturing need with uncompromising quality.

busesHeavyMachinery.title: Buses and Heavy Construction Machines Windshields and Window Glass
busesHeavyMachinery.subtitle: Heavy Vehicle Glazing Specialists

about.qualityCommitment: Our commitment to quality is validated through ISO 9001 certification, ensuring that every product meets the highest international standards for quality management.
about.qualitySystemDescription: ISO 9001 certification ensures that every aspect of our operation is designed to deliver consistent quality and customer satisfaction.

qms.title: Quality Management System
qms.description: Comprehensive QMS ensuring consistent product quality and customer satisfaction across all operations.

customerRequirements.title: Customer Requirements
customerRequirements.description: Systematic approach to understand, document, and consistently meet customer expectations and specifications.

regulatoryCompliance.title: Regulatory Compliance
regulatoryCompliance.description: Full compliance with international standards and local regulatory requirements for all our products.

continuousImprovement.title: Continuous Improvement
continuousImprovement.description: Ongoing process optimization and quality enhancement through regular audits and performance monitoring.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: From initial design consultation to final installation, our comprehensive service portfolio ensures your glass projects are delivered with precision, quality, and expertise.

estimating.title: Estimating
estimating.description: Comprehensive cost estimation services with value engineering strategies to optimize your project budget while maintaining quality standards.

design.title: Design
design.description: Custom glass solutions and aesthetic engineering tailored to your architectural vision and functional requirements.

manufacturing.title: Manufacturing
manufacturing.description: State-of-the-art in-house production using high-end technology, specifically adapted to African climate conditions and requirements.

installation.title: Installation
installation.description: Certified experts ensure quality, safety, and precision in every installation project, from planning to completion.

serviceProcess.title: Our Service Process
serviceProcess.description: From initial consultation to final installation, we provide end-to-end support for all your glass manufacturing needs.

companyOverview.description1: VITROSAK, founded in 2004 and located in Sétif, Algeria, is a major producer of automotive, decorative, and architectural glass. With a facility of over 15,000 m², including 4,500 m² production area, the company provides high-performance glass for mass production and customized projects.
companyOverview.description2: We serve both domestic and international markets with our commitment to quality, innovation, and customer satisfaction. Our state-of-the-art manufacturing capabilities are specially adapted to the African climate and market demands.

stats.commitmentDescription: Our commitment to excellence is reflected in our capabilities and achievements

productHero.description: From architectural marvels to automotive precision, discover our comprehensive range of high-performance glass solutions engineered for excellence and adapted to demanding environments.
productHero.iso9001Description: Quality management systems ensuring consistent excellence
productHero.internationalStandardsDescription: Meeting global quality requirements and safety standards
productHero.customSolutionsDescription: Tailored products for specific applications and requirements

gallery.description: Explore our portfolio of completed projects showcasing architectural glass, custom designs, and innovative solutions across Algeria.
gallery.featuredDescription: A selection of our finest work in architectural glass, custom installations, and innovative glass solutions.
gallery.wantToFeatureDescription: If you have a project featuring VITROSAK glass solutions that you'd like to showcase, we'd love to hear from you and potentially include it in our gallery.

internationalReach.description: Thanks to our reputation and dedication to quality, VITROSAK has expanded its reach beyond our headquarters in Sétif, with a showroom in Oran and proudly exporting to international partners in Tunisia and Mauritania.

partners.description: We collaborate with leading companies and organizations to deliver exceptional glass solutions across various industries and applications.
partners.collaborativeDescription: Working closely with partners to understand unique requirements and deliver tailored solutions.
partners.industryExpertiseDescription: Deep understanding of various sectors including automotive, construction, and industrial applications.
partners.longTermDescription: Building lasting partnerships based on trust, quality, and mutual success in the marketplace.

serviceHero.description: From initial design consultation to final installation, our comprehensive service portfolio ensures your glass projects are delivered with precision, quality, and expertise.
serviceHero.expertConsultationDescription: Professional guidance throughout your project lifecycle
serviceHero.certifiedTeamDescription: Skilled professionals with extensive industry experience
serviceHero.endToEndSupportDescription: Complete service from design to installation and beyond
